    • Method Detail

      • mergeWithChunkOnEdge

        public void mergeWithChunkOnEdge(Chunk chunk,
                        Edge edge)
        Merges another chunk into this one on given edge. The edge on witch they merge will be removed from the chunk graph and will be used to connect the nodes inside the chunk. This chunk will take all of the reads and edges from the provided one, and will alter the edges so that the other edges that the provided chunk had now point to this chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunk - Chunk to merge into this one
        edge - Edge on witch to merge

      • getEdgeWithChunk

        public Edge getEdgeWithChunk(Chunk another)
        Gets the Edge object representing the edge between the provided chunk
        Parameters:
        another - Another chunk
        Returns:
        Edge between chunks or null
